pageTitle: PilyQ Black Horizon Cover Up Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 35in / 89cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, Colombia. Hand wash. 100% polyester. Fabric: Soft jersey. Cool stripes lend a daring perspective to this PilyQ cover-up dress. The angular hem creates an asymmetrical edge, and the V neckline adds flirtation. Drawstrings cinch the bust, and halter ties fasten behind the neck. Back cutout. Description Clothing > PilyQ > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer PilyQ swimwear operates under a simple mission statement: "Vive la vida!" It's this live-life motto that drives designers Pily Queipo and Amber Delecce to create easy, versatile pieces that outfit a stylish getaway from sunup to sundown. The brand supports their feminine-meets-edgy designs with beautiful cuts that flatter the figure, making the woman wearing PilyQ feel sexy and confident every minute of the day. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
